strings.nav.trends: Yanayin zamani (nan ba da jimawa ba)
strings.search.title: Binciken kalmomin muhimmi
strings.search.placeholder: Shigar da kalmar muhimmi (misali, isar da pizza)
strings.search.hint: Shawarwari da yanayin zamani kyauta. Sakamakon za su bayyana a kasa.
strings.kpi.real_data_keywords: Kalmomin muhimmi da bayanai na gaske
strings.meta.title: Lucy World – Nazarin bincike na gida don Najeriya
strings.meta.description: Gano bayanan Hausa Google tare da shawarwari, yanayin zamani da nazarin AI da ke ƙarfafa yanke shawara game da abun ciki da ci gaban kasuwanci.
strings.meta.keywords: kalmomin muhimmi na Hausa, SEO Najeriya, yanayin zamani na Google, girman bincike, nazarin AI, dabarun abun ciki na gida
strings.hint.site_vs_search: Yi amfani da masu zaɓi na sama don zaɓar ƙasar bincike da harshe. Canza harshen dubawa daga menu na gefe.
